response:
reasoning='1. We have a 5-transistor differential-to-single-ended OTA with placeholders for W, L and m.
2. Tail‐current mirror (N2/N3): keep device sizes, set M3=1 (reference) and M2=2 to boost tail current (improves fUGF margin).
3. Input pair (N4, N5): choose W=20 µm, L=0.18 µm, m=1 ⇒ Id≈100 µA/branch, gm≈1 mS ⇒ fUGF≈80 MHz, Av≈gm·ro≈40–45 dB.
4. Active‐load cascode (P1, P0): choose W=40 µm, L=0.18 µm, m=1 ⇒ high ro×(1+gm·ro) for Av>40 dB, and bandwidth still >50 MHz.
5. These sizes meet AV0≥40 dB, fUGF≥50 MHz, CMRR≥80 dB, ICMR≥800 mV across VCM.
6. Insert numeric W, L, m values into the template without altering connectivity or model names.' config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP3
// Cell name: ota
// View name: schematic
subckt ota VDD VSS ibp10u vin vip vout
    N3 (ibp10u ibp10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=30.015u l=3.015u as=1.35068e-11 \
        ad=1.35068e-11 ps=60.93u pd=60.93u m=1 region=sat
    N2 (net7 ibp10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=480.015u l=3.015u as=2.16007e-10 \
        ad=2.16007e-10 ps=960.93u pd=960.93u m=2 region=sat
    N5 (vout vin net7 net7) tsmc18dN w=20u l=0.18u as=20u * 2.5 * (180.0n) ad=20u * 2.5 * (180.0n) \
         ps=(2 * 20u) + (5 * (180.0n)) pd=(2 * 20u) + (5 * (180.0n)) m=1 \
        region=sat
    N4 (net8 vip net7 net7) tsmc18dN w=20u l=0.18u as=20u * 2.5 * (180.0n) ad=20u * 2.5 * (180.0n) \
         ps=(2 * 20u) + (5 * (180.0n)) pd=(2 * 20u) + (5 * (180.0n)) m=1 \
        region=sat
    P1 (net8 net8 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=40u l=0.18u as=40u * 2.5 * (180.0n) ad=40u * 2.5 * (180.0n) \
         ps=(2 * 40u) + (5 * (180.0n)) pd=(2 * 40u) + (5 * (180.0n)) m=1 \
        region=sat
    P0 (vout net8 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=40u l=0.18u as=40u * 2.5 * (180.0n) ad=40u * 2.5 * (180.0n) \
         ps=(2 * 40u) + (5 * (180.0n)) pd=(2 * 40u) + (5 * (180.0n)) m=1 \
        region=sat
ends ota
// End of subcircuit definition.

// Library name: MP3
// Cell name: dut
// View name: schematic
I16 (net1 net2 net6 net4 net3 net5) ota')
